name: a dark drive
description:
a dark drive in an unreliable car.  sound on!

  • Made in 48 hours for the gmtk 2020 game jam
  • Controls are on screen
  • Made in the quadplay engine by:
    •  Ed Luong
    • Nick Porcino
    • Stephan Steinbach
  • Sounds are creative commons from freesound
  • Quadplay engine by Morgan McGuire
